about_the_game:
Welcome to Yorkshire Counties, a Fictional Map inspired by the UK areas of Yorkshire. The map has tight roads and an even tighter Timetable this map will challenge even the most experienced OMSI Driver.

The map gives Drivers the challenge of assessing corners before navigating them designed to simulate real-life challenges surrounding UK Roads.

Challenges such as correct mirror usage, assessing the behavior of road users, and pedestrian dangers.

Throughout the map, Drivers can experience a vast variety of beautiful scenery inspired by
Yorkshire such as Town Centers, Villages & Country Lanes as well as a beautifully reimagined Sea Front.

Boasting a Viaduct with a view, a long beach, All-Weather Textures, Seasonal Texturing for all 4 seasons, and several points of interest.

We are excited and proud to provide OMSI Players with an immersive, unique, and detailed driving experience like never before. Welcome to Yorkshire!


  • Hillswick Viaduct
  • Ingleborough Seafront
  • Windhaven Beauty Spot (Screenshot Area)
  • 2 Yorkshire Depots (First and Yorkshire Terrier)
  • AI Tram Network to complete the immersion
  • Official Ticketer, First South Yorkshire, and Hulleys of Baslow endorsement
  • Night Time, University & Park and Ride Routes
  • 2 New Buses specced for Yorkshire (YC Masterdeck & YC Veiling B8RLE)
  • Timetabled PDF Files & User Manual (Printable Material)
  • Fully compatible and tested in Bus Company and Control Centre Simulator
  • Full Depot Runs at the start, during and end of service.
  • ...and so much more

Welcome to Yorkshire Counties, a Fictional Map inspired by the UK areas of Yorkshire. The map has tight roads and an even tighter Timetable this map will challenge even the most experienced OMSI Driver.

The map gives Drivers the challenge of assessing corners before navigating them designed to simulate real-life challenges surrounding UK Roads.

Challenges such as correct mirror usage, assessing the behavior of road users, and pedestrian dangers.

Throughout the map, Drivers can experience a vast variety of beautiful scenery inspired by

Boasting a Viaduct with a view, a long beach, All-Weather Textures, Seasonal Texturing for all 4 seasons, and several points of interest.

We are excited and proud to provide OMSI Players with an immersive, unique, and detailed driving experience like never before. Welcome to Yorkshire!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: min. 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: min. 1024 MB, DirectX 9.0c or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
